content: Internal memo from Polk Health Network dated 12/01/2023 outlines new coverage exemptions for patients enrolled in the Advanced Gene Therapy Outcomes Study (AGTO-2217). Patients with dual neuropathy/immunodeficiency diagnoses are prioritized for expedited review. Refer to policy exception codes 4400-4500 series. Contact lead coordinator Margo Vescovi at m.vescovi@polkhealth.org for approvals.
